title: Milli Vanilli: Girl You Know It's True (1989)
brief_description: Milli Vanilli performs in the music video “Girl You Know It’s True”

constellations_other.name: Voice and the moving image
constellations_other.description: Sound changed cinema, but it wasn't always welcome, but it hasn't stopped people aspiring for the spotlight.

title_for_label: Milli Vanilli: Girl You Know It’s True (1989)
description: Milli Vanilli performs in the music video “Girl You Know It’s True” from the album “Girl You Know It’s True” recorded for Arista Records. The music video opens with a man playing the synthesizer. Rob and Fab dance as they lip sync in front of a wall covered in curtains. Clips of a breakup play throughout.
